title: Courtney's Christmas Wish
description: Sawyer Falls librarian Courtney Kane has spent a fortune on her hair, makeup and outfit to impress Grant Harris at a Christmas party. She is determined for him to see her as more than a friend. While at the party, she meets Tony, a really nice guy who makes it obvious that he’s attracted to her. When Grant drops a bombshell by announcing his engagement, devastated Courtney makes an impulsive decision to leave Sawyer Falls for good.At a crossroads, Courtney looks for guidance to help her decide what path she should choose on the journey of life. What does life have in store for Courtney and will she get her Christmas wish?Read Courtney’s Christmas Wish to find out. Courtney's Christmas Wish is a Christian Fiction/Sweet Romance Novelette.
author: H.M. Bailey
